column1: Enhancing Skills of Sri Lankan Tour Guides
From  the  perspective  of  tourists  of  different  age,  tourists'  recommendations  regarding  TGs
demonstrate varying recommendations across aged tourists. The middle-aged segment of 36-45
seems critical of TG service, whereas younger and older segments seem convinced to recommend
TG service to others. A remarkably higher percentage (61%) of older tourists highly recommend
TG services in Sri Lanka (refer to Figure 39).
